transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hello? Ha Manish ha ji. Ha Manish bhai. Pawan baat kar raha tha sir. Ha ji. Mai kal se connect kar raha hu sir baat nahi ho pa rahi. Busy hai kya sir aap?
Customer: Are bhai ye yaar hum to yaar. Thik hai. Ha. Sir ye ab aapki aawaz thodi kam aa rahi hai kya karein? Kab tak free ho jayenge sir?
Executive: Hello? Kya hua?
Customer: Ha sir. Manish ji kab tak free ho jayenge mai Pawan baat kar raha tha India Mart se sir.
Executive: Achha sir. Kya karna hai?
Executive: Sir actually aapne na customer care pe wo kiya tha na ek call kiya tha. To usi ke related maine call kiya tha. To agar aap free hai to ek baar Google Meet pe aa jaye sir.
Customer: Sir abhi to free nahi hu. Ha sir abhi free nahi hu abhi mai aaya market se. Ha sir aa gaya aa gaya.
Executive: Achha sir market gaya. Kab tak free ho jayenge aap?
Customer: Mai na 3 baje ke baad free ho jaunga sir.
Executive: Thik bhai thik thik. 3 baje ke baad call karunga. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not free at the moment.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back at 3 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, customer care, google meet, follow up
